description.narrative: The proposed equity financing is for Medgenome Inc. (Medgenome or the Company), Indias leading genetic diagnostics, research and data licensing player. Founded in 2013, MedGenome is a genomics and clinical data driven diagnostics and research company with a focus on next generation sequencing (NGS). It is leading genetic diagnostics player in India with a footprint across South Asia and is set to expand its operations into other geographies. Company is headquartered in Foster City, California and has a state-of-the-art, College of American Pathology (CAP) certified lab and research center in Bangalore, India.

Expected development impact includes: (i) Access to genetic diagnostic services and targeted medication (ii) Market creation by significantly deepening the genomic segment via demonstration and replication, and capacity building channels.

name.narrative: Medgenome Inc. is registered in Delaware, USA and has an Indian subsidiary with office in Bangalore, India. It currently provides research services to clients in USA and genetic diagnostics tests in India
